content.value_statement: Create professional cover images for articles. Analyzes your content to select the best visual style and generates hand-drawn style illustrations that make your articles stand out.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes article content to automatically select appropriate visual style
Generates 2.35:1 aspect ratio cover images in hand-drawn illustration style
Offers 8 distinct style options: elegant, tech, warm, bold, minimal, playful, nature, retro
Supports custom title text with subtitle options
Generates detailed image prompts for AI image generation
Saves output to organized directory structure with prompts preserved
limitations: Does not directly generate images - works with baoyu-gemini-web skill for actual image creation
Title text limited to 8 characters maximum
Only supports Chinese and English content analysis
Image generation depends on external AI service availability

use_cases.title: Blog post covers
use_cases.description: Create consistent, professional cover images for blog posts that establish visual brand identity

use_cases.title: Newsletter headers
use_cases.description: Generate eye-catching headers for email newsletters that increase open rates and engagement

use_cases.title: Social media visuals
use_cases.description: Create platform-optimized cover images for articles shared on WeChat, X, and other platforms

Visual: Circuit patterns and data nodes in deep blue and electric cyan
Visual: Organic elements with earthy tones and calming green palette
Style: bold (auto-selected based on urgency signals)
Visual: High contrast composition with attention-grabbing elements

best_practices: Let auto-style selection analyze your content for the best visual match
Keep title text under 8 characters for maximum impact and readability
Review generated prompts before image generation to ensure accuracy
Use consistent styles across related articles for brand coherence
anti_patterns: Using overly long titles that become unreadable at small preview sizes
Choosing styles that contradict your article tone and message
Generating covers without considering the target platform image requirements
Skipping the prompt review step when precision matters

faq.question: What aspect ratio does baoyu-cover-image generate?
faq.answer: The skill generates cover images at 2.35:1 aspect ratio, which is the standard for WeChat article covers.

faq.question: Can I use this skill without an article file?
faq.answer: Yes, you can paste content directly after invoking the skill. The content will be analyzed to select an appropriate style.

faq.question: How does auto-style selection work?
faq.answer: The skill scans your content for style signals. For example, tech keywords select tech style, emotional words select warm style.

faq.question: Does this skill generate images directly?
faq.answer: No, baoyu-cover-image generates detailed prompts. It calls the baoyu-gemini-web skill to actually create the image.

faq.question: What languages does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill supports Chinese and English content analysis. Generated title text matches the content language.

faq.question: How many styles are available?
faq.answer: Eight styles are available: elegant, tech, warm, bold, minimal, playful, nature, and retro.
